item.description: This is a great place to take a Sunday walk.  The town paved an old railroad track and made a delightful walk area.  Afterward, we’ll eat lunch.  No charge for walk.  For info, call Art 860-426-8122.  Directions to walk:  I-84 to Exit 39 (Rt. 4), stay on Rt. 4 about 5-6 miles, where Rt. 4 turns left at light go straight onto Rt. 179, at stop turn right and go over Collinsville Bridge (still on Rt. 179), take 1st right onto Main St., park on left or down on right side of trail by wooden fence.  Look for a group of singles.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be waiting in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
